AND D.DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode}

SELECT A.DOC_CODE, A.PERIOD_CODE, A.DOC_FORM_CODE, A.EMP_CODE, A.DOC_TITLE, TO_CHAR(A.DOC_ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS DOC_ENROLL_DATE, A.DOC_UPDATED, A.DOC_STATUS , TO_CHAR(A.DOC_APPR_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS DOC_APPR_DATE, P.PERIOD, E.EMP_NAME, D.DEPT_NAME, F.FORM_NAME FROM APPROVAL_DOC A INNER JOIN EMP E ON E.EMP_CODE = A.EMP_CODE INNER JOIN DOC_FORM F ON F.FORM_CODE = A.DOC_FORM_CODE INNER JOIN DOC_RETENTION_PERIOD P ON P.PERIOD_CODE = A.PERIOD_CODE INNER JOIN DEPT D ON D.DEPT_CODE = E.DEPT_CODE WHERE A.DOC_CODE = #{docCode} AND A.DOC_STATUS = 'N'

SELECT D.DOC_CODE, D.FORM_DETAIL_CODE, D.DOC_CONTENT, T.FORM_DETAIL_NAME, T.FORM_DETAIL_TYPE FROM DOC_DATA D INNER JOIN DOC_FORM_DETAIL_TEMPLATE T ON T.FORM_DETAIL_CODE = D.FORM_DETAIL_CODE WHERE D.DOC_CODE = #{docCode}

SELECT A.DOC_CODE, A.APPR_TYPE_CODE, A.APPR_EMP_CODE, A.APPR_SEQ, TO_CHAR(A.APPR_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS APPR_DATE, A.APPR_STATUS , E.EMP_NAME, D.DEPT_NAME, R.RANK_NAME, T.APPR_TYPE_NAME FROM APPROVAL_LIST A INNER JOIN EMP E ON E.EMP_CODE = A.APPR_EMP_CODE INNER JOIN DEPT D ON D.DEPT_CODE = E.DEPT_CODE INNER JOIN RANK R ON R.RANK_CODE = E.RANK_CODE INNER JOIN APPROVAL_TYPE T ON T.APPR_TYPE_CODE = A.APPR_TYPE_CODE WHERE A.DOC_CODE = #{docCode} ORDER BY A.APPR_TYPE_CODE, A.APPR_SEQ ASC
SELECT R.DOC_CODE, R.REF_EMP_CODE, R.CHECK_YN, E.EMP_NAME FROM APPROVAL_REF R INNER JOIN EMP E ON E.EMP_CODE = R.REF_EMP_CODE WHERE R.DOC_CODE = #{docCode}

SELECT A.APPR_TYPE_CODE, T.APPR_TYPE_NAME FROM APPROVAL_LIST A INNER JOIN APPROVAL_TYPE T ON T.APPR_TYPE_CODE = A.APPR_TYPE_CODE WHERE A.DOC_CODE = #{docCode} GROUP BY A.APPR_TYPE_CODE, T.APPR_TYPE_NAME ORDER BY A.APPR_TYPE_CODE ASC

SELECT E.EMP_NAME AS WRITER_NAME, C.COMMENT_CODE, C.DOC_CODE, C.WRITER_CODE, TO_CHAR(C.COM_ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS COM_ENROLL_DATE, C.COM_CONTENT, C.COM_STATUS FROM DOC_COMMENT C INNER JOIN EMP E ON E.EMP_CODE = C.WRITER_CODE WHERE DOC_CODE = #{docCode} AND COM_STATUS = 'C'

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM APPROVAL_DOC WHERE DOC_STATUS = 'N'

SELECT D.DOC_CODE, D.PERIOD_CODE, D.DOC_FORM_CODE, D.EMP_CODE, D.DOC_TITLE, TO_CHAR(D.DOC_ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS DOC_ENROLL_DATE, TO_CHAR(D.DOC_UPDATED, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS DOC_UPDATED, D.DOC_STATUS, F.FORM_NAME, E.EMP_NAME FROM APPROVAL_DOC D INNER JOIN DOC_FORM F ON D.DOC_FORM_CODE = F.FORM_CODE INNER JOIN EMP E ON E.EMP_CODE = D.EMP_CODE WHERE D.DOC_STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY D.DOC_CODE DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM APPROVAL_DOC A INNER JOIN APPROVAL_LIST L ON L.DOC_CODE = A.DOC_CODE WHERE L.APPR_STATUS = ANY (SELECT L.APPR_STATUS FROM APPROVAL_LIST L WHERE L.APPR_STATUS = 'W') AND L.APPR_EMP_CODE = #{empCode} AND A.DOC_STATUS = 'N'

SELECT DISTINCT(A.DOC_CODE) AS DOC_CODE, A.DOC_FORM_CODE, A.DOC_TITLE, A.EMP_CODE, TO_CHAR(A.DOC_ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS DOC_ENROLL_DATE, E.EMP_NAME, F.FORM_NAME FROM APPROVAL_DOC A INNER JOIN DOC_FORM F ON A.DOC_FORM_CODE = F.FORM_CODE INNER JOIN EMP E ON E.EMP_CODE = A.EMP_CODE INNER JOIN APPROVAL_LIST L ON L.DOC_CODE = A.DOC_CODE WHERE L.APPR_STATUS = ANY (SELECT L.APPR_STATUS FROM APPROVAL_LIST L WHERE L.APPR_STATUS = 'W') AND L.APPR_EMP_CODE = #{empCode} AND A.DOC_STATUS = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM APPROVAL_DOC A INNER JOIN APPROVAL_REF R ON A.DOC_CODE = R.DOC_CODE WHERE R.REF_EMP_CODE = #{empCode} AND A.DOC_APPR_DATE IS NULL

SELECT DISTINCT(A.DOC_CODE) AS DOC_CODE, DF.FORM_NAME, A.DOC_TITLE, A.EMP_CODE, E.EMP_NAME, TO_CHAR(A.DOC_ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS DOC_ENROLL_DATE FROM APPROVAL_DOC A, (SELECT F.DOC_CODE, F.REF_EMP_CODE FROM APPROVAL_REF F) F, (SELECT DF.FORM_CODE, DF.FORM_NAME FROM DOC_FORM DF) DF, (SELECT E.EMP_CODE, E.EMP_NAME FROM EMP E) E, (SELECT * FROM APPROVAL_LIST L) L WHERE A.DOC_CODE = F.DOC_CODE AND A.EMP_CODE = E.EMP_CODE AND A.DOC_FORM_CODE = DF.FORM_CODE AND L.APPR_STATUS = ANY (SELECT L.APPR_STATUS FROM APPROVAL_LIST L WHERE L.APPR_STATUS = 'W') AND L.DOC_CODE = F.DOC_CODE AND A.DOC_STATUS = 'N' AND F.REF_EMP_CODE = #{empCode}

WITH T1 AS (SELECT A.DOC_CODE, A.DOC_TITLE, A.DOC_FORM_CODE, L.APPR_SEQ, L.APPR_STATUS , F.FORM_NAME, E.EMP_NAME, TO_CHAR(A.DOC_ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS DOC_ENROLL_DATE, A.DOC_STATUS, A.DOC_APPR_DATE FROM APPROVAL_DOC A INNER JOIN APPROVAL_LIST L ON A.DOC_CODE = L.DOC_CODE INNER JOIN DOC_FORM F ON A.DOC_FORM_CODE = F.FORM_CODE INNER JOIN EMP E ON E.EMP_CODE = A.EMP_CODE WHERE L.APPR_STATUS = 'W' AND A.DOC_STATUS = 'N' AND L.APPR_EMP_CODE = #{empCode}) SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T1 INNER JOIN APPROVAL_LIST L ON T1.DOC_CODE = L.DOC_CODE WHERE L.DOC_CODE = T1.DOC_CODE AND L.APPR_SEQ = T1.APPR_SEQ-1 AND L.APPR_STATUS = 'A' AND T1.DOC_APPR_DATE IS NULL

WITH T1 AS (SELECT A.DOC_CODE, A.DOC_TITLE, A.DOC_FORM_CODE, L.APPR_SEQ, L.APPR_STATUS , F.FORM_NAME, E.EMP_NAME, TO_CHAR(A.DOC_ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS DOC_ENROLL_DATE, A.DOC_STATUS FROM APPROVAL_DOC A INNER JOIN APPROVAL_LIST L ON A.DOC_CODE = L.DOC_CODE INNER JOIN DOC_FORM F ON A.DOC_FORM_CODE = F.FORM_CODE INNER JOIN EMP E ON E.EMP_CODE = A.EMP_CODE WHERE L.APPR_STATUS = 'W' AND A.DOC_STATUS = 'N' AND L.APPR_EMP_CODE = #{empCode}) SELECT T1.DOC_CODE, T1.DOC_FORM_CODE, T1.DOC_TITLE, T1.EMP_NAME, T1.FORM_NAME, T1.DOC_STATUS, T1.DOC_ENROLL_DATE FROM T1 INNER JOIN APPROVAL_LIST L ON T1.DOC_CODE = L.DOC_CODE WHERE L.DOC_CODE = T1.DOC_CODE AND L.APPR_SEQ = T1.APPR_SEQ-1 AND L.APPR_STATUS = 'A'

WITH T1 AS (SELECT A.DOC_CODE, A.DOC_TITLE, A.DOC_FORM_CODE, L.APPR_SEQ, L.APPR_STATUS , F.FORM_NAME, E.EMP_NAME, TO_CHAR(A.DOC_ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS DOC_ENROLL_DATE, A.DOC_STATUS FROM APPROVAL_DOC A INNER JOIN APPROVAL_LIST L ON A.DOC_CODE = L.DOC_CODE INNER JOIN DOC_FORM F ON A.DOC_FORM_CODE = F.FORM_CODE INNER JOIN EMP E ON E.EMP_CODE = A.EMP_CODE WHERE L.APPR_STATUS = 'W' AND A.DOC_STATUS = 'N' AND A.EMP_CODE = #{empCode}) SELECT DISTINCT(T1.DOC_CODE) AS DOC_CODE, T1.DOC_FORM_CODE, T1.DOC_TITLE, T1.EMP_NAME, T1.FORM_NAME, T1.DOC_STATUS, T1.DOC_ENROLL_DATE FROM T1 INNER JOIN APPROVAL_LIST L ON T1.DOC_CODE = L.DOC_CODE WHERE L.DOC_CODE = T1.DOC_CODE
